channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lots of litter and leaves no t been picked for weeks, 5th November
item.description:
Lots of litter on the street this has been here for weeks. Local mp said it is on the rota to be picked 3 time a week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow lines degecrive, 5th November
item.description:
I live at 31 Rowanwood Avenue. When the recent yellow lines were pointed, there was a car parked in the bend. The yellow lines were appointed either side of the parked car. So we now have a car paring regularly between the lines in a dangerous spot. The lines need to made continuous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, 72, Rowanwood Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Seriously Damaged Street Sign, 5th November
item.description:
This damaged street sign was reported in May 2025 which report was probably mistakenly marked by the council as fixed, as it has not been replaced yet. Photos taken today 05.11.25 Please replace this damaged street sign on the corner of Sheperds Ln & Foxglove Path, SE28

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxglove Path, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary traffic lights signal, 5th November
item.description:
